meanings.definition: A check issued as payment for work done.
meanings.sent1: I received my paycheque on Friday for all the hours I worked.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to deposit your paycheque into your bank account to access the funds.
meanings.sent3: My cat mistook my paycheque for a toy and started playing with it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a paycheque on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The paycheque was like a golden ticket to financial stability.

meanings.definition: To give money in exchange for goods or services.
meanings.sent1: I will paycheque the mechanic for fixing my car.
meanings.sent2: Remember to paycheque the cashier before leaving the store.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly told my friend I would paycheque them for their hilarious jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her generosity was like paychequing kindness to everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The company will paycheque the employees at the end of the month for their hard work.
